entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a student who is revising for exams and is frustrated with the amount of homework. She is described as snapping at Ron and reminding him that they need to pass their exams.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as Hermione's friend who is also revising for exams. He is reminded by Hermione that they need to pass their exams.

entities.name: nicolas flamel
entities.description: Nicolas Flamel is mentioned as someone who lived for 600 years and is used as a comparison by Hermione to emphasize how long it will take to learn the material.

entities.name: dragon's blood
entities.description: Dragon's blood is mentioned as something that Hermione is reciting the uses of during the Easter holidays.

relationships.description: Hermione and Ron are arguing about how much time they have to revise for their exams.
Hermione needs to pass her exams in order to get into the second year.
